text: Shutman Lake (; , Šutmansko jezero) is one of the largest mountain lakes in the Sharr Mountains in Kosovo. It is located in southern Kosovo, in the municipality of Dragaš. It lies on an elevation of above sea level. The lake has a maximum length of and a maximum width of . It is deep. == Notes and references == Notes: References: Category:Lakes of Kosovo Category:Šar Mountains
title: Shutman Lake
